hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Friday Blue - Tallest Building with Blue Sky
hiveArticle.body:
Burj Khalifa is the tallest building in the world which is on a height of 2,717 ft. It looks magnificent, so here are some of the views of it.

![IMG-20160213-WA0026.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcNucMAp5r6c2tohZyuFAwuJjENKF2hc2dawRDYg5vXCL/IMG-20160213-WA0026.jpg)

![IMG-20160213-WA0038.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPSYdgxq1wY1BiKbmrSnLgWySstCvEd1LCHD827caZ6Vr/IMG-20160213-WA0038.jpg)

![IMG-20160213-WA0049.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaR6SJ2uCqwtUKjEEHPaw56MFskPhZuN5SPKPxLg1EbNS/IMG-20160213-WA0049.jpg)

### Camera : Nokia 6
